00021 void TrainWeakClassifiers()
00022 {
00023         int i,j;
00024         REAL* errors; REAL* threshes;
00025         int* parity; int* indexes; 
00026         ofstream of;
00027 
00028         errors = new REAL[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(errors!=NULL);
00029         threshes = new REAL[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(threshes!=NULL);
00030         indexes = new int[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(indexes!=NULL);
00031         parity = new int[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(parity!=NULL);
00032 
00033         InitializeWeights();
00034         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00035         {
00036                 FillTheTable(gTable[i],gClassifiers[i]);
00037                 for(j=0;j<gTotalCount;j++) gLabels[j] = gTrainSet[j].label;
00038                 SingleFeatureClassifier(gLabels,gClassifiers[i],gTable[i]);
00039                 errors[i] = gClassifiers[i].error;
00040                 parity[i] = gClassifiers[i].parity;
00041                 threshes[i] = gClassifiers[i].thresh;
00042         }
00043         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++) indexes[i] = i;
00044         QuickSort(errors,indexes,threshes,parity,0,gTotalFeatures-1);
00045 
00046         of.open(FFS_WeakClassifiers_filename);
00047         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00048                 of<<indexes[i]<<" "<<threshes[i]<<" "<<errors[i]<<" "<<parity[i]<<endl;
00049         of.close();
00050 
00051         delete[] errors; errors = NULL;
00052         delete[] threshes; threshes = NULL;
00053         delete[] indexes; indexes = NULL;
00054         delete[] parity; parity = NULL;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void LoadWeakClassifiers(int* const indexes)
00058 {
00059         ifstream f;
00060         int i,j;
00061 
00062         f.open(FFS_WeakClassifiers_filename);
00063         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00064         {
00065                 f>>indexes[i];
00066                 f>>gClassifiers[indexes[i]].thresh;
00067                 f>>gClassifiers[indexes[i]].error;
00068                 f>>gClassifiers[indexes[i]].parity;
00069         }
00070         f.close();
00071 
00072         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++)
00073                 for(j=0;j<gTotalCount;j++)
00074                         gTable[i][j]=gClassifiers[i].Apply(gTrainSet[j]);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void BuildHistogram(const int* const curresult, const int size,int* const hist_pos, int* const hist_neg, const int facecount)
00078 {
00079         int i;
00080 
00081         memset(hist_pos,0,sizeof(*hist_pos)*size);
00082         memset(hist_neg,0,sizeof(*hist_neg)*size);
00083         for(i=0;i<facecount;i++) hist_pos[curresult[i]]++;
00084         for(i=facecount;i<gTotalCount;i++) hist_neg[curresult[i]]++;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void FFS_Histogram(AdaBoostClassifier& ada,const int round,int* const curresult,ofstream& f,const int method)
00088 {
00089         int i,j,k;
00090         int* hist_pos; int* hist_neg;
00091         int* tempresult;
00092         int error,minerror,minindex;
00093         int thresh,minthresh;
00094         bool* used;
00095 
00096         tempresult = new int[gTotalCount]; ASSERT(tempresult!=NULL);
00097         hist_pos = new int[round+1]; ASSERT(hist_pos!=NULL);
00098         hist_neg = new int[round+1]; ASSERT(hist_neg!=NULL);
00099         used = new bool[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(used!=NULL);
00100         for(i=0;i<gTotalFeatures;i++) used[i]=false;
00101         f<<"Begin Histogram FFS"<<endl;
00102         ada.InitToGivenSize(round);
00103         for(i=0;i<gTotalCount;i++) curresult[i] = 0;
00104         for(i=0;i<round;i++)
00105         {
00106                 minerror = INT_MAX; minindex = -1; minthresh = INT_MAX;
00107                 for(j=0;j<gTotalFeatures;j++)
00108                 {
00109                         if(used[j]) continue;
00110                         int temp;
00111                         for(k=0;k<gTotalCount;k++) tempresult[k] = curresult[k] + gTable[j][k];
00112                         BuildHistogram(tempresult,i+2,hist_pos,hist_neg,gFaceCount);
00113                         error = temp = gTotalCount-gFaceCount;
00114                         for(k=0;k<=i+1;k++)
00115                         {
00116                                 temp = temp - hist_neg[k] + hist_pos[k];
00117                                 if(temp<error)  { error = temp; thresh = k+1; }
00118                         }
00119                         if(error<minerror)
00120                         {
00121                                 minerror = error;
00122                                 minindex = j;
00123                                 minthresh = thresh;
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 used[minindex]=true;
00127                 ada.alphas[ada.count] = 1;
00128                 ada.scs[ada.count] = gClassifiers[minindex];
00129                 ada.count++;
00130                 ada.thresh = REAL(minthresh);
00131                 for(j=0;j<gTotalCount;j++) curresult[j] += gTable[minindex][j];
00132                 f<<i+1<<"\t"<<minindex<<"\t"<<minerror<<"\t"<<gClassifiers[minindex].thresh<<endl;
00133         }
00134         BuildHistogram(curresult,round+1,hist_pos,hist_neg,gFaceCount);
00135         for(i=1;i<=round;i++) { hist_neg[i] += hist_neg[i-1]; hist_pos[i] += hist_pos[i-1]; }
00136         i=0; while(hist_neg[i]<(gTotalCount-gFaceCount)*(1-gNode_fp_Goal)) i++;
00137         switch(method)
00138         {
00139                 case GOAL_METHOD_MIN_ERROR: 
00140                         break;
00141                 case GOAL_METHOD_VALID_DR: 
00142                         ValidateTheThreshold(ada,f); 
00143                         break;
00144                 case GOAL_METHOD_FIX_FP: 
00145                         ada.thresh = i + REAL(0.5); 
00146                         break;
00147         }
00148         f<<ada.thresh<<"\t"<<hist_pos[i-1]<<"\t"<<gTotalCount-gFaceCount-hist_neg[i-1]<<endl;
00149 
00150         int fn,fp;
00151         f<<"Training Error:"<<endl;
00152         fn = 0; for(i=0;i<gFaceCount;i++) if(ada.ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i])==0) fn++;
00153         fp = 0; for(i=gFaceCount;i<gTotalCount;i++) if(ada.ApplyImagePatch(gTrainSet[i])==1) fp++;
00154         f<<fn<<"\t"<<fp<<endl;
00155         f<<"Validation Error:"<<endl;
00156         fn = 0; for(i=0;i<gValidFaceCount;i++) if(ada.ApplyImagePatch(gValidationSet[i])==0) fn++;
00157         fp = 0; for(i=gValidFaceCount;i<gValidationCount;i++) if(ada.ApplyImagePatch(gValidationSet[i])==1) fp++;
00158         f<<fn<<"\t"<<fp<<endl;
00159         f<<"End of Histogram FFS"<<endl;
00160         delete[] hist_pos; hist_pos=NULL;
00161         delete[] hist_neg; hist_neg=NULL;
00162         delete[] tempresult; tempresult=NULL;
00163 }

00165 void ForwardFeatureSelection(AdaBoostClassifier& ada,const int round,const bool update,const int method)
00166 {
00167         int* curresult;
00168         int* indexes;
00169         ofstream f;
00170 
00171         ada.Clear();
00172 
00173         curresult = new int[gTotalCount]; ASSERT(curresult!=NULL);
00174         indexes = new int[gTotalFeatures]; ASSERT(indexes != NULL);
00175         f.open(FFS_log_filename);
00176         TrainWeakClassifiers();
00177         LoadWeakClassifiers(indexes);
00178         FFS_Histogram(ada,round,curresult,f,method);
00179         if(update) AppendAdaBoostClassifier(ada);
00180 
00181         delete[] curresult; curresult=NULL; 
00182         delete[] indexes; indexes=NULL;
00183         f.close();
00184 }
